Game: Animal Genius 2007-09-25T00:00:00-07:00 Animal Genius is a puzzle video game released for the computer in 2003, the Leapster in 2006, and Nintendo DS in 2007. Jack DeVries, writing for IGN, gave the game a score of 6.5/10, concluding that it is a decent title for young children with an interest in animals. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/7a758188-b016-48fe-8f2f-e6dafc063683.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/6b2c2d6c-9172-4132-acaa-9890d21d201b.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/41e399a3-9e15-463e-971e-a71c7bfed801.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/c6593658-dc8e-4fd7-885a-cdae36b0b0dd.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animal_Genius E - Everyone Puzzle; Education Big Blue Bubble Scholastic
